Using the ideal gas law, the temperature at state B is calculated as T_B = 400 K.

Using the ideal gas law, the temperature at state C is calculated as T_C = 300 K.
Using the ideal gas law, the temperature at state D is calculated as T_D = 225 K.
The work done in segment A→B (isobaric process) is calculated as W_AB = 100000 J.
The work done in segment B→C (isochoric process) is calculated as W_BC = 0 J.
